panels.title: Current Provider
Current Cost
Region

targets.query: select  "name", io_role, io_instance_type, node_cpu_cores, node_memory_bytes, io_storage_size from alameda_cluster_status..node

panels.content:
<script>
  $('#panel-12 .table-panel-table tbody').on('DOMSubtreeModified', function() {
    var dataLength = this.children.length;
    if (dataLength > 0) {
      for(var i = 0; i < dataLength; i++) {
        if (this.children[i].innerText.indexOf('idle') !== -1) {
          this.children[i].style.backgroundColor = '#3f6833';
        }
      }
    }
  });
  
  $('#panel-48 .table-panel-table tbody').on('DOMSubtreeModified', function() {
    var dataLength = this.children.length;
    if (dataLength > 0) {
      for(var i = 0; i < dataLength; i++) {
        if (this.children[i].innerText.indexOf('idle') !== -1) {
          this.children[i].style.backgroundColor = '#3f6833';
        }
      }
    }
  });
</script>
<style>
  #panel-36 {
   display:none
  }

  .pieLabel > div {
   color: white !important;
  }
 </style>
panels.title: Panel Title

targets.query: select sum from (select 100 - sum(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5]]$/ and starttime = '$ns_starttime' group by time(3600s)) where sum >= 0

select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5]]$/ and starttime = '$ns_starttime' group by namespacename, time(3600s)

select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and appname =~ /^[[app_top_5]]$/ and starttime = '$app_starttime' and namespacename = '$ns' group by appname, time(3600s)

select last("") as namespacename, 100 - sum(costpercentage) as costpercentage, (($current_cost + 0) / 730) - sum(workloadcost) as workloadcost from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5]]$/ and starttime = '$ns_starttime'

select namespacename, costpercentage, workloadcost from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5]]$/ and starttime = '$ns_starttime'
select mean(workloadcost) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and time >= now()-5d and time <= now() group by time(3600s), namespacename
select mean(workloadcost) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '1' and time >= now()-1h  and time <= now() +1d group by time(3600s), namespacename

panels.title: Cost Per Hour: Observation, and Prediction

targets.query: select sum from (select ((($current_cost + 0) * ($count_of_hourlycost + 0)) / 730) - sum(workloadcost) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5_monthly]]$/ and $timeFilter) where sum >= 0
select sum(workloadcost) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5_monthly]]$/ and $timeFilter group by namespacename
select sum(workloadcost) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and appname =~ /^[[app_top_5_monthly]]$/ and $timeFilter and namespacename = '$ns' group by appname

select last("") as namespacename, 100 - (sum(workloadcost) * 730 * 100 / ($count_of_hourlycost + 0) / ($current_cost + 0)) as costpercentage, ((100 - (sum(workloadcost) * 730 * 100 / ($count_of_hourlycost + 0) / ($current_cost + 0))) / 100) * ($count_of_hourlycost + 0) / 730 * ($current_cost + 0 )  as workloadcost from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5_monthly]]$/ and $timeFilter

select sum(workloadcost) * 730 * 100 / ($count_of_hourlycost + 0) / ($current_cost + 0) as costpercentage, sum(workloadcost) as  workloadcost from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5_monthly]]$/ and $timeFilter group by namespacename
select cumulative_sum(workloadcost) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and $timeFilter group by namespacename

select history + prediction from (select sum(workloadcost) as history from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and $timeFilter group by namespacename),
(select cumulative_sum(workloadcost) as prediction from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and type = '1' and $timeFilter and time >= now() group by namespacename) group by namespacename fill(previous)

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from namespace with key = "name"
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from namespace with key = "name"

list.definition: select io_provider from alameda_cluster_status..node time >= now() -2h and  granularity = '3600' order by time desc limit 1
list.name: current_provider
list.query: select io_provider from alameda_cluster_status..node order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select starttime from alameda_fedemeter..calculate_instance where time >= now() -2h and  granularity = '3600' order by time desc limit 1
list.name: current_cost_starttime
list.query: select starttime from alameda_fedemeter..calculate_instance where time >= now() -2h and  granularity = '3600' order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select sum(totalcost) as totalcost from alameda_fedemeter..calculate_instance where starttime = $current_cost_starttime fill(0)
list.name: current_cost
list.query: select sum(totalcost) as totalcost from alameda_fedemeter..calculate_instance where starttime = $current_cost_starttime fill(0)

list.definition: select io_region from alameda_cluster_status..node order by time desc limit 1
list.name: current_region
list.query: select io_region from alameda_cluster_status..node order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2h
list.name: ns_starttime
list.query: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2h

list.definition: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2h and namespacename = '$ns'
list.name: app_starttime
list.query: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2h and namespacename = '$ns'

list.definition: select namespacename from (select top(costpercentage, namespacename, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and starttime = '$ns_starttime' )
list.name: ns_top_5
list.query: select namespacename from (select top(costpercentage, namespacename, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and starttime = '$ns_starttime' )

list.definition: select appname from (select top(costpercentage, appname, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and starttime = '$app_starttime' and namespacename = '$ns')
list.name: app_top_5
list.query: select appname from (select top(costpercentage, appname, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '3600' and type = '0' and starttime = '$app_starttime' and namespacename = '$ns')

list.definition: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2d
list.name: ns_starttime_monthly
list.query: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2d

list.definition: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2d and namespacename = '$ns'
list.name: app_starttime_monthly
list.query: select last(starttime) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and time >= now() -2d and namespacename = '$ns'

list.definition: select namespacename from (select top(costpercentage, namespacename, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and starttime = '$ns_starttime_monthly' )
list.name: ns_top_5_monthly
list.query: select namespacename from (select top(costpercentage, namespacename, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and starttime = '$ns_starttime_monthly' )

list.definition: select appname from (select top(costpercentage, appname, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and starttime = '$app_starttime_monthly' and namespacename = '$ns')
list.name: app_top_5_monthly
list.query: select appname from (select top(costpercentage, appname, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..cost_app where granularity = '86400' and type = '0' and starttime = '$app_starttime_monthly' and namespacename = '$ns')

list.definition: select count(sum) -1 from (select sum(numMeasurements) from _internal.."database" where $timeFilter  and time <= now() group by time(3600s) fill(0));
list.name: count_of_hourlycost
list.query: select count(sum) -1 from (select sum(numMeasurements) from _internal.."database" where $timeFilter  and time <= now() group by time(3600s) fill(0));
